page_content:
Lancaster Colony Corporation
ESG
CORPORATE 
SUSTAINABILITY
REPORT
2021
This Corporate Sustainability Report (CSR) covers the activities 
of Lancaster Colony for the fiscal year ending June 30, (FY20)
unless otherwise noted. It responds to stakeholder interest in 
how material environmental, social, and governance factors 
affect our operations and how we, in response, develop 
sustainable business practices and mitigate risk.
